title: Bring your own cup - Double Discounts
body: We're celebrating Green Week at Squeezebox and Squeeze at Verve by offering a massive Double Discount on hot drinks when you bring your own cup! available Mon 21st Mar - Sun 27th Mar 2022

title: Rest and Reset Lounge
body: Come and join the Officer Team and the Wellbeing Society in Verve for a free hot drink and a chat! This event takes place on Thu 24th of March 6pm - 8pm
semanticLabel: image of rest and reset lounge

title: Supernatural Sunday
body: Run by Melantha ~ Supernatural Sundays is where you can learn about all things paranormal, whether thats just regular spirits to even the darkest of demons.

title: Green Week Crafternoon
body: Join us for an afternoon in Squeezebox at Verve for a Green Week Crafternoon. Bring your creative skills to life and help us to make decorations for LRV or even something to take home. We'll be recycling, repurposing and re-using all sorts of crafting items and materials. Grab a drink, get a bite to eat and get crafting. Even on Fri 25th of March
